sentence: Running again against Brian Kemp, Abrams trails 48.5 points to 44 points in the RealClearPolitics poll average.
author: Dan McLaughlin
title: The Candidates Who Can't Afford to Lose in 2022

sentence: That means rejecting the politics of voter-fraud paranoia as, hopefully, Republican primary voters will do by choosing Brian Kemp over David Perdue in the Georgia gubernatorial primary.
title: Will Democrats Soon Be Locked Out of Power?
